channel.title: The most fun i had in the rsc scene lets bring it back
channel.description:
sup guys im posting here to be truthful.
I like RSC and when kingpk came back for the little while people were on playing THIS is the most FUN I've had since the real runescape classic. Anyone wanna bring it back with me? This is the only hope (besides rsce which has players) for a fun runescape classic memory and to have FUN.

item.title: The most fun i had in the rsc scene lets bring it back
item.dc:creator: @matty_matt matty matt
item.description:
@matty_matt wrote:

-Nothing:

So basically you are stuck at same point as year ago. Tve very same point where I stopped helping you.

im trying man i really want to learn, but if try for hours and days then it dont work… just wanna get it to work :\

edit: Panu you have helped me alot and i thank you for that, i learned alot from you.

Read full topic
item.source: The most fun i had in the rsc scene lets bring it back

item.title: The most fun i had in the rsc scene lets bring it back
item.dc:creator: @matty_matt matty matt
item.description:
@matty_matt wrote:

I have a forums all ready to go.
I just need to learn how to edit the register.php to add forum user and character to game database which i think i have done.
Now all i need to figure out is playerloginhandler for players to be able to log in with the username that was added into the database.

Read full topic
item.source: The most fun i had in the rsc scene lets bring it back

item.title: The most fun i had in the rsc scene lets bring it back
item.dc:creator: @inspectah inspectah
item.description:
@inspectah wrote:

I’d play if it was decent enough exp. Pking and staking is all that’s left to do really. Too many people try the “Replica” approach and it just doesn’t work.

Read full topic
item.source: The most fun i had in the rsc scene lets bring it back

item.title: The most fun i had in the rsc scene lets bring it back
item.dc:creator: @matty_matt matty matt
item.description:
@matty_matt wrote:

[quote="-Nothing, post:4, topic:533769"][quote author=matty matt link=topic=652564.msg4372475#msg4372475 date=1381089168]

Hello,

You should come take a look at RSCRevolution.com

We are currently replicating the whole game . It will be exactly like the Runescape Classic we all played. Our free to play game play is replicated and all our free to play quests are currently working and we are now working on all the pay to play content including all p2p quests and working Cannon.

We will also make sure to bring all the good stuff to make wilderness active and create a good competition among the top pkers with ranking and much more.

hello have you seen rscemulation, they have been alive way longer than you and far more advanced then you. If i wanted to play a server where most things are replicated i would play rscemulation… as you will see you will gain players but not that many will play your server.
On topic:
Whos with me if not then I will do it myself, i may just need help with the website side of things.
[/quote]
Since when have you been able to do anything yourself?
EDIT: RSCEmulation more advanced than their server? Lol, RSCE is getting updated like once a year with useless, non-content features. I have seen more progress from RSCR in 2 weeks.[/quote]
since i look at how other do it and learn from it. I did state i may need help with website like character mangement, but if i look around there is probably one someone has released.

as far as the argument that this other server it has only been up for a couple weeks and they are not anywhere near rsce content. What more can they have then rsce??? this other server looks like it has alot of potential don’t get me wrong but it will not last as you will see in the future.

On topic:
Players of runescape classic don’t want all this shit anyways… Players that are left in the scene just wana pk and stake…minimal skilling players left… This game is dead besides these 2 things… Lets throw it up and there will be 30+ online… Which is way better than some other Server trying to replicate what RSCE has already done!

Read full topic
item.source: The most fun i had in the rsc scene lets bring it back

item.title: The most fun i had in the rsc scene lets bring it back
item.dc:creator: @Nothing1 -Nothing
item.description:
@Nothing1 wrote:

[quote=“matty matt, post:3, topic:533769”][quote author=RSCRevolution link=topic=652564.msg4372467#msg4372467 date=1381087432]
Hello,

You should come take a look at RSCRevolution.com

We are currently replicating the whole game . It will be exactly like the Runescape Classic we all played. Our free to play game play is replicated and all our free to play quests are currently working and we are now working on all the pay to play content including all p2p quests and working Cannon.

We will also make sure to bring all the good stuff to make wilderness active and create a good competition among the top pkers with ranking and much more.
[/quote]
hello have you seen rscemulation, they have been alive way longer than you and far more advanced then you. If i wanted to play a server where most things are replicated i would play rscemulation… as you will see you will gain players but not that many will play your server.
On topic:
Whos with me if not then I will do it myself, i may just need help with the website side of things.[/quote]
Since when have you been able to do anything yourself?
EDIT: RSCEmulation more advanced than their server? Lol, RSCE is getting updated like once a year with useless, non-content features. I have seen more progress from RSCR in 2 weeks.
And to be honest, RSCR is more of runescape classic “emulation” than RSCE will ever be.

Read full topic
